briefdescription.para: ESP32-specific logger implementation for the HardFOC system.

detaileddescription.para: This file provides the ESP32 implementation of the BaseLogger interface, utilizing ESP-IDF's esp_log system (both Log V1 and Log V2) for efficient and feature-rich logging. It supports all ESP32 variants (C6, Classic, S2, S3, C3, C2, H2) and provides comprehensive logging capabilities with performance monitoring.

simplesect.para: This implementation is thread-safe and optimized for ESP32 platforms.
Supports both ESP-IDF Log V1 (default) and Log V2 (enhanced) systems.
